channel.title: How do i fix my java?
channel.description: ok well today i tried to get on my server im coding and the client and on every client and server this happends [img]http://www.runedigital.net/upload/uploads/1229927835.bmp[/img] some1 said i had ti update my java but when i got to dl it it closes the internet brouser along with the downlaod.

item.title: How do i fix my java?
item.dc:creator: @thepker13 thepker13
item.description:
@thepker13 wrote:

well in your run.bat just right click it and select edit. then u erase all of it and add in this:

@echo off
color 0a
set path=“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin”
%path%java.exe server
pause

just cahnge the jre6 into the jre u have =D and trust me it will work 100% garuntee[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 06:04:29 pm[/size][hr]Ok go and find the run file and then right click it and click on edit. Delete all of it and replace it wit this:

@echo off
color 0a
set path=“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin”
%path%java.exe server
pause

Just change the jer6 to the version of jre6 u have! Have fun and this does work 100%

Read full topic
item.source: How do i fix my java?
